statements: SELECT * FROM SatelliteImages ORDER BY capture_date DESC;
SELECT image_id, image_url, location FROM SatelliteImages WHERE location = 'Amazon';
SELECT image_id, capture_date, deforestation_detected FROM SatelliteImages WHERE deforestation_detected = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM SatelliteImages WHERE location = 'Indonesia' ORDER BY capture_date ASC;
SELECT image_id, location, deforestation_detected FROM SatelliteImages ORDER BY location, capture_date;
SELECT * FROM SatelliteImages WHERE deforestation_detected = TRUE
SELECT image_url, capture_date, location FROM SatelliteImages WHERE location = 'Amazon Rainforest'
SELECT image_id, image_url, capture_date FROM SatelliteImages WHERE capture_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT image_id, image_url, location FROM SatelliteImages ORDER BY location ASC, capture_date DESC
SELECT image_id, image_url, capture_date FROM SatelliteImages WHERE deforestation_detected = FALSE
SELECT * FROM deforestation_activities;
SELECT id, timestamp, deforestation_level FROM deforestation_activities ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM conservation_efforts WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, initiative_name, conservation_budget FROM conservation_efforts WHERE conservation_budget > 100000 ORDER BY conservation_budget DESC;
SELECT id, satellite_id, location FROM deforestation_activities WHERE deforestation_level > 0.5;
SELECT id, timestamp, location FROM deforestation_activities WHERE deforestation_level > 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, satellite_id, location FROM deforestation_activities WHERE location IS NOT NULL ORDER BY satellite_id
SELECT id, timestamp, deforestation_level FROM deforestation_activities WHERE deforestation_level < 0.2 ORDER BY deforestation_level ASC
SELECT * FROM conservation_efforts WHERE conservation_budget > 100000 ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT id, initiative_name, start_date, end_date, location FROM conservation_efforts WHERE end_date > CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY initiative_name
SELECT * FROM forest_regions;
SELECT region_name, region_description FROM forest_regions ORDER BY region_name DESC;
SELECT image_id, image_name, captured_date FROM satellite_images WHERE region_id = 2;
SELECT activity_type, activity_date, activity_description FROM deforestation_activities WHERE activity_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM forest_regions WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM forest_regions WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT region_id, region_name FROM forest_regions ORDER BY region_name ASC;
SELECT region_name, region_description FROM forest_regions WHERE region_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM satellite_images WHERE captured_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT region_name, image_name FROM forest_regions INNER JOIN satellite_images ON forest_regions.region_id = satellite_images.region_id;
SELECT * FROM SatelliteImages;
SELECT image_id, image_url, capture_date FROM SatelliteImages ORDER BY capture_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM DeforestationAlerts WHERE alert_type = 'Fire';
SELECT team_name, team_lead, team_size FROM MonitoringTeam WHERE team_size > 5;
SELECT effort_name, start_date, end_date FROM ConservationEfforts WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM SatelliteImages;
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, alert_message FROM DeforestationAlerts WHERE alert_type = 'Fire';
SELECT effort_name, effort_description FROM ConservationEfforts WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT team_name, team_lead, team_size FROM MonitoringTeam ORDER BY team_size DESC;
SELECT image_id, image_url, capture_date, ST_AsText(location_geopoint) AS location FROM SatelliteImages;
SELECT * FROM SatelliteImages;
SELECT image_url, captured_date FROM SatelliteImages WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM DeforestationAreas WHERE deforestation_level = 'High';
SELECT area_name, area_size FROM DeforestationAreas ORDER BY area_size DESC;
SELECT team_name, leader_id FROM MonitoringTeam WHERE team_name LIKE '%Conservation%';
SELECT * FROM SatelliteImages;
SELECT image_id, image_url, captured_date FROM SatelliteImages WHERE captured_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT area_name, area_size, deforestation_level FROM DeforestationAreas WHERE deforestation_level = 'High' ORDER BY area_size DESC;
SELECT team_name, leader_id FROM MonitoringTeam WHERE team_name LIKE 'Team%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT alert_id, alert_description, alert_date FROM DeforestationAlerts ORDER BY alert_date DESC LIMIT 10;
